ai-patthana19.8:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: One whatever is suitable for the three times of the Dhamma
ai-patthana19.8:1.1_0: by not seeing the things that should be given up by not seeing, and with the causes of condition.
ai-patthana19.8:1.1_1: One thing should be given up without seeing, and with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana19.8:1.1_2: because of not seeing the things that should be given up by not seeing, and for the development of the qualities that arise with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana19.8:2.1_0: One should not give up any desire (of the teaching) to be given up by development and seeing causes.
ai-patthana19.8:2.1_1: Not can be given up again and again, again with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana19.8:2.1_2: Neutrally knowing and seeing; these three things should be given up. They should not be given up by developing and cultivating the reason for not recognizing the development of the qualities that arise.
ai-patthana19.8:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give up tending to develop the teaching with vision to development, and the conditions that give rise to development.
ai-patthana19.8:3.1_1: You shouldn’t give up this teaching with vision to see, and five conditions.
ai-patthana19.8:3.1_2: This is the section in brief.
